meanings.sent1: The bucket was emptiable, so I poured out the water easily.
meanings.sent2: The trash can is emptiable, allowing us to dispose of our waste.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat was emptiable, making it perfect for pulling out surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt emptiable, as if all emotions had drained away.
meanings.sent5: The balloon was so emptiable that it collapsed in on itself when the air was released.

meanings.sent1: The storage container is emptiable, so we can clear out the clutter easily.
meanings.sent2: The pitcher is emptiable, allowing us to pour out the liquid inside.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar was emptiable, tempting me to eat all the treats inside.
meanings.sent4: His promises were emptiable, disappearing as quickly as they were made.
meanings.sent5: The backpack was so emptiable that it seemed to swallow everything put into it.
